actions.value: After performing the top action of any ability card, you may immediately perform the bottom action of the same card. This item cannot be used if both actions trigger a lost card icon consumed %game.card.lost%.
The next three times you would gain %game.condition.poison% prevent the condition.
The next five times you would gain %game.condition.poison% prevent the condition.
You are immune to %game.condition.curse%, even if the item is spent. On the next three sources of damage from attacks targeting you gain %game.action.shield% 1.
During your melee attack, %game.element.consume.wild% to add +2 %game.action.attack% to a single attack.
During your ranged attack, add +2 %game.action.attack%, %game.condition.curse%, and %game.condition.wound% to a single attack.
During your movement, add +2 %game.action.move% to the movement and gain %game.condition.regenerate%.
During any one ally's movement, add +2 %game.action.move% to the movement.
When you kill a monster during your turn, gain one money token.
During your single-target melee attack action, add %game.action.range:3% to the attack.
During your turn, %game.action.teleport% to any unoccupied hex within 4 hexes of you.
When you perform a long or short rest, gain %game.condition.strengthen%.
You are immune to POISON and !enchantment-circle!. When damage by an attack, gain %game.action.shield% 0 !enchantment-circle! for the attack.
